operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO pts_updates_ngen (user_id, pts, update_type, update_data, date2) VALUES (:user_id, :pts, :update_type, :update_data, :date2)

operation.name: SelectLastPtsByUserId
operation.sql: SELECT pts FROM pts_updates_ngen WHERE user_id = :user_id ORDER BY pts DESC LIMIT 1
